Please copy:
llvm\include\* --> include\
C:\src\llvm\build\include\llvm\Support\*.h --> include\llvm\Support
C:\src\llvm\build\include\llvm\Config\*.h --> include\llvm\Config
C:\src\llvm\build\include\llvm\IR\*.inc --> include\llvm\IR
C:\src\llvm\build\include\llvm\IR\*.gen --> include\llvm\IR
\llvm\build\Debug|Release\lib --> lib\
